name: Grey Block
storyline:
Theo Church is the victim of a massive conspiracy hatched by his wealthy and powerful father, David that had him committed to the Green Valley Psychiatric hospital (a hospital that David is a premier donor to) for the rest of his life.

On this fateful night, Nikki Salzano, a player in the original conspiracy, breaks into Green Valley to help Theo escape. However, as a good infiltration specialist would, Nikki knows that in order for Theo to fully escape his father’s grasp he needs to collect evidence that proves there was a conspiracy to have him committed.
summary:
A story-rich, 3rd-person, cinematic, stealth puzzle/shooter that asks the player to help Theo Church escape the Green Valley Psychiatric Hospital where he has been committed while unravelling the conspiracy that landed him there.

As Theo, you’ll have to navigate the hospital’s halls as stealthily as possible while collecting as much evidence by hacking computer terminals, locating paper documents, and taking pictures of items that need to be seen to be believed. You’ll have to maneuver around security guards, and lure them out of their offices so you can access their terminal and increase your keycard access. This will allow you to push deeper into the hospital and uncover more of its secrets with the ultimate goal of reaching the highly-secure, state-of-the-art, research wing donated by Theo’s father - Church Institute of Psychological Research, but referred to amongst the patients of Green Valley as Grey Block.

What secrets will you uncover in the world of Grey Block?
